module.name: ap239_properties
module.keywords: module, properties, classification, action, resource, general, independent, quantity, unit, measure, numeric, range

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of properties of objects, their values and types, and classifications, in order to enable product life cycle support.

inscope.li: the specification of a property definition;
single numerical property values with units;
specification of a property that is a list of properties;
qualification of the property as to type, uncertainty, or meaning;
specification of the definitions needed to assign management resource information to a class of properties;
specification of the definitions needed to classify properties;
classification of property definitions and values.

outscope.li: definitions of particular properties or classes;
assignments of particular properties to particular classes.

uof.name: Ap239_Properties
uof.description: The Ap239_Properties UoF enables definitional properties to be assigned to product life cycle support data.
